text:
Hello Dev Team!
I am a newcomer to HubSpot. I would like to avoid developing on the Design Tool but work locally. I've seen that the CLI allows you to fetch and upload changes automatically, but what advantage does this approach have? I use VS Code and I have installed the extension and for example the autocomplete of custom fields is not managed but they are default fields.

for one, i use it on bigger builds to integrate with git — if something doesn’t work out, or changes direction, it’s one rollback instead of undoing dozens of files.

and even more importantly, locally, you can use things like react, node, sass, etc. and compile them before sending them to HubSpot.

Do anyone get in trouble with?
```hs fetch```
I can`t fetch changes which I have made in Design Tools (hs fetch doesn`t update files).
Thanks Melinda! How can I compile locally ?

that’s a whole separate subject from HubSpot — you’ll have to get familiar with setting up a local project that compiles to your watched directory. If you’re not familiar with projects using frameworks, nodejs, sass, etc. you’ll need to start there and work HubSpot in as you go.

Ok understand. I am familiar with React, however at the moment I only have Html + Hubl projects and I don't understand what the advantage is of working locally, apart from using git for versioning code and doing rollbacks of changes as you said.
well, you can’t run react or sass or node or anything like that in the design manager.
if all you’re going to do is HTML + HubL, there might not be a ton of advantage, but projects tend to get bigger quickly
Ok so There are advantages only with js frameworks
not necessarily. those are the things I, professionally, find most advantageous. I find it hard to operate without sass and npm.

Yes but for simple HTML websites I need only to test my web pages locally and push changes remotely. Command `watch`  is useful because you can update file immediately but it could be slower due to updates need http requests
yeah, if that’s what works for you, go for it!
But in your opinion, What are the advantages of HubSpot compared to any other hosting service like Aws, Kimsufi etc.? Because the price is high compared with these services
not familiar with Kimsufi, but regarding AWS, it’s a totally different type of system. AWS is web and server services. HubSpot is a CRM.
